optionLines: Exactly! I also spent a lot of time on the quiz.
Yeah! The quiz was so hard. The TA even said the grade would be curved.
Well... I don't know... Probably we are just gifted for that?
Um... Not really. I just studied how to answer these questions yesterday.
...maybe... do you guys really believe that?
OK. Nevermind. Let's just do Frank's idea. We don't have too much time left now.
Alright, maybe it's my bad for not making it clear. Let me try saying it another way...
I THINK YOU DIDN'T GET MY POINT ACTUALLY. IT'S VERY DIFFERENT FR OM FRANK'S IDEA. IT'S LIKE......
